hmr: A rîlbawtu po po dâm, a thin tuomtu duorda dâm, a kal pahni le a thâu dâm chu a lâk a, mâichâma chun Mosie chun a raw tah a.

en: But the bullock, and its skin, and its flesh, and its dung, he burnt with fire without the camp; as Jehovah commanded Moses.
hmr: Bâwngchal chu a vun leh a sa leh, a êk leh riebûk puoah a rawh a, LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk ang khan.

en: And he presented the ram of the burnt-offering: and Aaron and his sons laid their hands upon the head of the ram.
hmr: Pumrawhmang thilinhlân be- râmchal chu a hung inhlân a, Aron le a naupasalhai chun berâmchal lu chunga chun an kut an innghat a.

en: And he killed it; and Moses sprinkled the blood upon the altar round about.
hmr: Mosie chun a that a, mâichâm chu thisen chun a the huol a.

en: And he cut the ram into its pieces; and Moses burnt the head, and the pieces, and the fat.
hmr: Berâmchal chu a chan a, a lu le a sa tlinhai le a thâuhai chu a rawh a.

en: And he washed the inwards and the legs with water; and Moses burnt the whole ram upon the altar: it was a burnt-offering for a sweet savor: it was an offering made by fire unto Jehovah; as Jehovah commanded Moses.
hmr: A sûng le a kehai chu a sâwp a; berâmchal chu mâichâmah a pum chun a raw vawng tah a; chu chu rim inhnik dinga pumrawhmang thilin- hlân, LALPA kuoma mei hmanga thilinhlân chu a nih, LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk ang khan.

en: And he presented the other ram, the ram of consecration: and Aaron and his sons laid their hands upon the head of the ram.
hmr: Chun, berâmchal dang, hlân- thiengna berâmchal chu a hang inhlân nâwk a; Aron le a naupasalhai chun berâmchal lu chunga chun an kut an innghat a.

en: And he slew it; and Moses took of the blood thereof, and put it upon the tip of Aaron’s right ear, and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot.
hmr: Mosie chun a that a, a thisen chu a lâk a, Aron nakâwr changtieng hmawra dâm, a kut changtieng kutpuia dâm, a ke changtieng kepuia dâm chun a nâl a.

en: And he brought Aaron’s sons; and Moses put of the blood upon the tip of their right ear, and upon the thumb of their right hand, and upon the great toe of their right foot: and Moses sprinkled the blood upon the altar round about.
hmr: Chun,Mosie chun Aron naupa- salhai chu a ṭhuoi a, thisen chu an nakâwr changtieng hmawra dâm, an kut changtieng kutpuia dâm, an ke changtieng kepuia dâm chun a nâl a; chun, mâichâm chu thisen chun a the huol a.

en: And he took the fat, and the fat tail, and all the fat that was upon the inwards, and the caul of the liver, and the two kidneys, and their fat, and the right thigh:
hmr: A thâu dâm, a mei thâu tak dâm, a rîlbawtu po po dâm chu, a thin tuomtu duorda le a kal pahni le a thâu dâm leh, a mal changtieng a lâk a.

en: and out of the basket of unleavened bread, that was before Jehovah, he took one unleavened cake, and one cake of oiled bread, and one wafer, and placed them on the fat, and upon the right thigh:
hmr: LALPA hmaa chawl ṭhanglo bei bâwma inthawk chun chawl ṭhang- lo bei pakhat le, hrieka hmet bei- phêk pakhat leh, beiphêk inphân pakhat leh a lâk a, sathâu chunga le a mal changtieng chunga chun a sieh a.

en: and he put the whole upon the hands of Aaron, and upon the hands of his sons, and waved them for a wave-offering before Jehovah.
hmr: A rêng chun Aron le a naupa- salhai kuta chun a sieh a; LALPA hmaa chun thêna thilinhlân dingin an thên a.

en: And Moses took them from off their hands, and burnt them on the altar upon the burnt-offering: they were a consecration for a sweet savor: it was an offering made by fire unto Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, Mosie chun an kuta in- thawk chun a lâk a, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chungah mâichâma chun a rawh a; chu chu riminhnik dinga suktumna thilinhlân, LALPA kuoma mei hmanga thilinhlân a nih.

en: And Moses took the breast, and waved it for a wave-offering before Jehovah: it was Moses’ portion of the ram of consecration; as Jehovah commanded Moses.
hmr: Chun, Mosie chun a ir chu a lâk a, LALPA hmaa thêna thilinhlân dingin a thên a, chu chu suktum- na berâmchala Mosie chanpuol a nih, LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk ang khan.

en: And Moses took of the anointing oil, and of the blood which was upon the altar, and sprinkled it upon Aaron, upon his garments, and upon his sons, and upon his sons’ garments with him, and sanctified Aaron, his garments, and his sons, and his sons’ garments with him.
hmr: Mosie chun hriek nâlmia in- thawk le, mâichâma thisena mi chu a lâk a, chu chun Aron le a silfênhai a theh a, a naupasalhai le an silfênhai khawm; Aron le a silfênhai chu a hlân thieng a, a naupasalhai le an silfên- hai khawm.

en: And Moses said unto Aaron and to his sons, Boil the flesh at the door of the tent of meeting: and there eat it and the bread that is in the basket of consecration, as I commanded, saying, Aaron and his sons shall eat it.
hmr: Mosie chun Aron le a naupa- salhai kuoma chun, “Intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah sa kha suong unla, ‘Aron le a naupasalhai chun fa rawhai se,’ tiha thu pêka ka um angin inhlân thiengna leikhâwra bei le chun chutaka chun fa ro.

en: And that which remaineth of the flesh and of the bread shall ye burn with fire.
hmr: Chun, sa le bei a la chuong chu meiah in raw ding a nih.

en: And ye shall not go out from the door of the tent of meeting seven days, until the days of your consecration be fulfilled: for he shall consecrate you seven days.
hmr: In inhlân thieng nihai a kim hmakhat chun, ni sari sûng chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâra inthawk chun suok naw tawp ro, hi inhlân thiengna hin ni sari sûng a aw ding a ni sih a.

en: As hath been done this day, so Jehovah hath commanded to do, to make atonement for you.
hmr: Tuta thaw ang hin intlanna siempêk ding cheuin LALPA chun thaw ding thu a pêk a nih.

en: And at the door of the tent of meeting shall ye abide day and night seven days, and keep the charge of Jehovah, that ye die not: for so I am commanded.
hmr: Intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bula chun ni sari, sûn le zân um zing in ta, in thi nawna dingin LALPA thupêk chu in zâwm ding a nih, chuong anga thu pêk chu ka nih,” a ta.

en: And Aaron and his sons did all the things which Jehovah commanded by Moses.
hmr: Chuongchun, LALPAIN Mosie hmanga thaw dinga thu a pêkhai po po chu Aron le a naupasalhai chun an thawh a.

en: And it came to pass on the eighth day, that Moses called Aaron and his sons, and the elders of Israel;
hmr: A ni riet ni chun Mosie chun Aron le a naupasalhai le Israel upahai chu a ko a;

en: and he said unto Aaron, Take thee a calf of the herd for a sin-offering, and a ram for a burnt-offering, without blemish, and offer them before Jehovah.
hmr: Aron kuoma chun, “Suol in- thâwina dingin bâwngte a chal, le pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin berâmchal demkailo ve ve kei la, LALPA hmaa chun inhlân rawh.

en: And unto the children of Israel thou shalt speak, saying, Take ye a he-goat for a sin-offering; and a calf and a lamb, both a year old, without blemish, for a burnt-offering;
hmr: Chun, Israel thlahai kuoma chun, ‘Suol inthâwina dingin kêlchal, pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin bâwngte le berâmte kum khat mi ve ve demkailo ṭhieu,

en: and an ox and a ram for peace-offerings, to sacrifice before Jehovah; and a meal-offering mingled with oil: for to-day Jehovah appeareth unto you.
hmr: le bâwngchal le berâmchal LALPA hmaa inremna thilinhlân dinga inhlân dingin hung kei unla; hrieka hmet fâkmi thilinhlân leh, vawisûn hin in kuomah LALPA a hung inlang ding a nih,’ tiin hril rawh,” a ta.

en: And they brought that which Moses commanded before the tent of meeting: and all the congregation drew near and stood before Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, Mosien thu a pêk ang chun intuokna puon in tuola chun an hung kei a; chun, mi po po chun an va hnai a, LALPA hmaa chun an va ngîr a.

en: And Moses said, This is the thing which Jehovah commanded that ye should do: and the glory of Jehovah shall appear unto you.
hmr: Mosie chun, “Hi hi a nih, in thaw dinga LALPAIN thu a pêk cheu kha; chuongchun, LALPA ropuina chu nangni lai hung inlang a tih,” a ta.

en: And Moses said unto Aaron, Draw near unto the altar, and offer thy sin-offering, and thy burnt-offering, and make atonement for thyself, and for the people; and offer the oblation of the people, and make atonement for them; as Jehovah commanded.
hmr: Chun, Mosie chun Aron kuomah, “Mâichâm kha hung hnai la, i suol inthâwina dâm, i pumrawhmang thilinhlân dâm inhlân la; nangma ta ding le mipuihai ta dingin intlanna siem rawh; chun, mipuihai thilinhlân chu inhlân la, intlanna siempêk rawh, LALPAIN thu a pêk ta angin,” a tih a.

en: So Aaron drew near unto the altar, and slew the calf of the sin-offering, which was for himself.
hmr: Chun, Aron chun mâichâm chu a va hnai a, ama puola suol inthâwina bâwgte chu a that a.

en: And the sons of Aaron presented the blood unto him; and he dipped his finger in the blood, and put it upon the horns of the altar, and poured out the blood at the base of the altar:
hmr: Aron naupasalhai chun thisen chu a kuoma chun an inhlân a, thisena chun a kutpâr chu ân chieh a, mâichâm kihaia chun a nâl a; thisen chu mâichâm bula chun a bunthlâk a;

en: but the fat, and the kidneys, and the caul from the liver of the sin-offering, he burnt upon the altar; as Jehovah commanded Moses.
hmr: suol inthâwina thâu dâm, a kal dâm, a thin tuomtu duorda dâm chu mâichâm chunga chun a rawh a, LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk ang khan.

en: And the flesh and the skin he burnt with fire without the camp.
hmr: A sa le a vun chu riebûk puoah a rawh a.

en: And he slew the burnt-offering; and Aaron’s sons delivered unto him the blood, and he sprinkled it upon the altar round about.
hmr: Chun, pumrawhmang thilin- hlân chu a that a, Aron naupasalhai chun thisen chu ama an pêk a, ama chun mâichâm chu a the huol a.

en: And they delivered the burnt-offering unto him, piece by piece, and the head: and he burnt them upon the altar.
hmr: Pumrawhmang thilinhlân sa tlin chu a tum tumin a lu leh an pêk a, ama chun mâichâma chun a lo rawh a.

en: And he washed the inwards and the legs, and burnt them upon the burnt-offering on the altar.
hmr: A sûnghai le a kehai chu a sâwp a, mâichâm chunga chun pumraw- hmang thilinhlân leh a rawh a.

en: And he presented the people’s oblation, and took the goat of the sin-offering which was for the people, and slew it, and offered it for sin, as the first.
hmr: Chun, mipuihai thilinhlân chu ân hlân a; mipuihai ta dinga suol inthâwina kêl chu a kei a, a that a, a hmaa mi ang bawk khan suol inthâwina ding chun ân hlân a.

en: And he presented the burnt-offering, and offered it according to the ordinance.
hmr: Chun, pumrawhmang thilin- hlân chu ân hlân a, a dân ang peiin ân hlân a nih.

en: And he presented the meal-offering, and filled his hand therefrom, and burnt it upon the altar, besides the burnt-offering of the morning.
hmr: Chun, fâkmi thilinhlân chu ân hlân a, chutaka mi chu a vei khatin a lâk a, zingkâr pumrawhmang thilin- hlân ti naw khawm chu mâichâma chun a raw bawk a.

en: He slew also the ox and the ram, the sacrifice of peace-offerings, which was for the people: and Aaron’s sons delivered unto him the blood, which he sprinkled upon the altar round about,
hmr: Mipui puola inremna inthâwina thilinhlân bâwngchal le berâmchal chu a that bawk a; Aron naupasalhai chun a thisen chu an pêk a, mâichâm chu a the huol a.

en: and the fat of the ox and of the ram, the fat tail, and that which covereth the inwards, and the kidneys, and the caul of the liver:
hmr: Bâwngchal thâu le berâmchal thâu dam, a mei thâu tak dâm, a rîlbawtu dâm, a kal dâm, a thin tuom- tu duorda dâm chu an pêk bawk a.

en: and they put the fat upon the breasts, and he burnt the fat upon the altar:
hmr: A thâu chu a ir chunga chun an sieh a; ama chun a thâu chu mâi- châma chun a lo rawh a.

en: and the breasts and the right thigh Aaron waved for a wave-offering before Jehovah; as Moses commanded.
hmr: A ir le a mal changtieng ruok chu Aron chun LALPA hmaa thêna thilinhlân dingin a thên a, Mosie thupêk angin.

en: And Aaron lifted up his hands toward the people, and blessed them; and he came down from offering the sin-offering, and the burnt-offering, and the peace-offerings.
hmr: Chun, Aron chun mipui tieng a bân a phar a, mal a sâwm tâwl a; suol inthâwina le pumrawhmang thilin- hlân le inremna thilinhlân ân hlân zo chun a hung ṭum a.

en: And Moses and Aaron went into the tent of meeting, and came out, and blessed the people: and the glory of Jehovah appeared unto all the people.
hmr: Chun, Mosie le Aron chu in- tuokna puon ina chun an va lût a; an hung suok nâwk a, mipuihai chu mal an sâwm a; chun, LALPA ropuina chu mi po po chunga chun a hung inlang tah a.

en: And there came forth fire from before Jehovah, and consumed upon the altar the burnt-offering and the fat: and when all the people saw it, they shouted, and fell on their faces.
hmr: LALPA hmaa inthawk chun mei a hung suok a, pumrawhmang thilinhlân le a thâuhai chu mâichâma chun a kâng hmang tah a; chu chu mipui po poin an hmu chun an khêk dur dur a, an bawkkhup ta ṭhuop a.
